website_summaries.verdict: This durable watch stands up to a lot of abuse. Waterproofing works well for recreational scuba diving.
pros: Customers appreciate being able to use this watch while performing rough activities
Good price point for solid performance
cons: Display screen can be tough to read
Some owners say the watch face is smaller than they expected it to be

customer_reviews.title: This is the watch that Harambe would have you buy, if he were here today to recommend a watch for you.
customer_reviews.text: The watch is perfect for what it does. It's tough, it has the basic features you would expect it to have, and it is fairly comfortable to wear. I think everyone needs one G-shock in their watch collection. You don't wear it because it is pretty--you wear it because you have work to do that would destroy a lesser watch. The thing is basically indestructible. There are much nicer G-Shocks, but you get less and less additional value for your money as you go up in price through the models.
customer_reviews.author: Richard C.

customer_reviews.title: Very hard to see unless you are in a direct and bright light source.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the watch because it is rated to be a scuba watch rated down to 660 ft. However to see the numbers and letters you must be in a bright direct light source. It does have a way to light up the dial but the owner's guide states that the battery will only last 2 years if the backlight operation is limited to 3.5 seconds a day and alarm operation in limited to 20 seconds per day. It further states that each illumination last an average of 2 seconds. Finally it says that if the battery power is used more than above, the life of the battery will be reduced accordingly.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce E.

customer_reviews.title: Can't see what time it is w/o light
customer_reviews.text: This watch can not be read at s unless I hit the led button. It doesn't matter if I turn the watch 45 degrees! It is smaller and cheaper looking than my 5 year old G-Shock. Originally, I thought this could be counterfeit but according to G-Shick website it is not... I think. I just got it at 5 pm yesterday. Watch just looks & feels cheap. **** This is the (Black) colored one and maybe the other colors can be seen better??? But I wouldn't bet on that. After all, I chose this color because the display looked the brightest. Not even close to the pics on Amazon's website. Very disappointed!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Sharp Looking Watch perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Not too big, not too small. Just right. Many of the oversized style of watches hang off the wrist and catch on things constantly. This is a good looking watch with a stealthy though perfectly readable reverse style LED readout. Backlight works great at night and isn't too bright and harsh. My son loves it. Lots of good functionality included as well though it would kick even bigger butt if it had a vibrating alarm feature. Solid buy. Sharp looking G Shock watch.
customer_reviews.author: Sven Krausenhammah

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to read display
customer_reviews.text: I got the black on black. Display it extremely dim and hard to read from straight on, it is extremely dim to blank. At about a 30 degree tilt it appears a little clearer. Not sure what is wrong, maybe a bad battery, who knows, I would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Mikey Likes it!

customer_reviews.title: G shock never disappoints
customer_reviews.text: So, I bought this watch as a gift for someone who had been wanting a watch, and since I own a G Shock and have experience with them, I thought they would like the watch as well. Out of the box, the watch is very sturdy and a little heavy to be able to deal with any kind of work or activity while wearing it. The night light could be a little brighter but it isn't a deal breaker, but if looking for a watch without breaking the bank, this is good intro watch for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Robis A.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic watch!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a replacement for one that I used at work for 12 years. My only complaint is that the display and light aren’t very bright. Otherwise, I like it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Gon

customer_reviews.title: Display challenging to read (Brightness)
customer_reviews.text: Returned this G-Shock model - Did not care for the display brightness - It was tough to read - Resurrected my old trusty Suunto yellow Vector with a new back access door and battery - The Suunto has a large digital display and is hard to kill - Thanks for the read !!!
customer_reviews.author: GORT

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk watch. Garbage. Waste of my time.
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst watch I’ve ever had. The illumination doesn’t work. And the numbers are not visible. If it’s night time have a flashlight ready so you can the time. Couldn’t give zero stars because it’s not available but don’t waste your money you will regret it as I did. The reviews the other people gave about not being able to see the numbers is very true it happened to me and I’m sure it’ll happen to you too. I just return mine and want nothing to do with this watch piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: David Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: I returned it
customer_reviews.text: The digits were VERY hard to read because they were light and the background was dark. I returned it immediately and bought the G-Shock that has dark digits on a light background. MUCH better (Model: DW5600E-1V
customer_reviews.author: Alan A. Gilmore

customer_reviews.title: Display is too dark to read
customer_reviews.text: The other 1 star reviews were correct. Wish I had read them. Display is almost impossible to read in the daylight because it is black numbers on a dark background. The box is marked in Chinese on the end flaps just as other reviews have stated. I certainly wouldn't buy this again and am returning it the same day I got it.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Hard to read in bright light
customer_reviews.text: I like the watch but not the band. This band is uncomfortable. If you are driving on a bright sunny day please do not look at this watch and try to read the time. You will wreck before you can read it. In bright light you can't read it even with the button to increase the brightness. Other wise it is very good watch.
customer_reviews.author: Huey Chief

customer_reviews.title: Super nice watch!
customer_reviews.text: A gift for my 20 year-old son. He absolutely loves it. He has never liked the look of the G-Shocks, but this one changed his mind. It's very good quality and I really like the size of it. It is big, but not too big...I guess that's a relative opinion, but it looks great on him.
customer_reviews.author: Mare Stott

customer_reviews.title: Deflects ricocheting bullets!!!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this watch for my brother-in-law who had joined the Marines. During one of their live-fire trainings, someone accidentally fired a round into the ground relatively close to where everyone was standing. The round ricocheted off of a rock and hit my brother-in-law's watch, saving his wrist, but obviously destroying the watch. Not only was the watch incredibly functional for what he was doing, its ability to withstand abuse literally saved his wrist and avoided a life-altering injury! 10/10 would buy again! Good job G-shock!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Andersson

customer_reviews.title: Dial is virtually unreadable in even moderately bright light
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I simply got a defective instance of this watch, but the gold-on-black numerals were virtually unreadable in even cloudy daylight. Returned, will shop for a different model
customer_reviews.author: cgt

customer_reviews.title: Yes, its real.
customer_reviews.text: The title says it all, real casio g-shock. People complain about it being to fragile ( thinking its fake) but obviously if you tteat it like crap, chances are it will work like crap. Has been in use for 8 months now and doesn't seem a day older than when it came out of its box. Remember, water resistant, NOT water-proof.
customer_reviews.author: ACE

customer_reviews.title: I am unable to read the dial - backlight function does not work
customer_reviews.text: I am planning to return this product because I cannot read the dial without a bright light. I tried to enable the backlight feature, but that didn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Landscape Gardener

customer_reviews.title: One week
customer_reviews.text: So far it works as expected. Only had it about a week. Fits good, lots of band adjustment holes.
customer_reviews.author: David K.

customer_reviews.title: Expect better
customer_reviews.text: Not as describe, hard to read the time cause the background is black same as the numbers. The light button need to be press in order to see the numbers but light is not bright enough to help.
customer_reviews.author: iris fontanex

customer_reviews.title: Weird fit
customer_reviews.text: Like those watch a lot. Only problem is that the sizing is awkward for my wrist. Best fit would be in between two of the holes.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Raya

customer_reviews.title: Makes nice gift.
customer_reviews.text: The resin face started getting damage early on, handsome watch, husband loved it until the cosmetic damages came. It was probably mostly his fault. Next watch will try something more hardy.
customer_reviews.author: Yurin8tion

customer_reviews.title: Good watch
customer_reviews.text: Decent watch for the price. Easy to set up and use. Display can be a little difficult to read indoors or areas with low light, but the illumination feature resolves this issue. The fit on my wrist took a little getting use to as opposed to other digital watches I've owned, but now I dont even notice I'm wearing it. The only issues I have would be the difficulty in reading the watch during low light and the band keeper pinches your skin when you are placing the end of the band in.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE!
customer_reviews.text: BEWARE!! If I could give zero stars I would. I’m pretty sure this is a fake GShock. The display was not readable. Also came in a cheap paper box that was busted open instead envelope when normal GShock’s I have bought in past come in a metal tin. This is definitely going back. This was supposed to be a birthday gift for my dad so I’m very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Apesride

customer_reviews.title: super hard to read - in middle of day - indoors
customer_reviews.text: I'm a soft office worker - I admit it. So most of my day is spent indoors, in front of my computer - and this watch is very difficult to read due to the low contrast between the brown numbers and black background. I found myself needing to press the light - in the middle of the day just to be able to see what time it was. I was oh so hopeful - but alas - it wasn't to be.
customer_reviews.author: Marquinho1p

customer_reviews.title: It’s a great watch.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son who is going to basic training for Air Force in April. He likes it. I saw Jocko had one and hoped that Jocko’s strength and wisdom would infused into my heart purchase of this watch to protect over my son as he makes this journey. I don’t think that’s how any of this works but the alternative sucks.
customer_reviews.author: Seasaltsgirl

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality/Value/Durability & Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Another solid watch from Casio. Does what it’s supposed to do. Nothing fancy but gets the job done and is easy on the eye and pocket. I have several Casio watches for everyday wear and a couple for casual/dress occasions. My expensive watches are still worn but my Casio watches get the most use. Haven’t worn one out yet.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Hunsaker

customer_reviews.title: I might add that my husband does a lot of farm work so I'm sure it gets roughed up a bit and it still looks and works great. He has even recommended it to friends at ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this watch. He wears it almost 24/7 (not in the shower) and it's still going strong. I might add that my husband does a lot of farm work so I'm sure it gets roughed up a bit and it still looks and works great. He has even recommended it to friends at work. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Candace C.

customer_reviews.title: Very Small, Very hard to read
customer_reviews.text: This watch is very small like a kids watch, I don’t recommend unless you’re looking for a smaller G shock, then I’d say this is for you, The Light feature doesn’t last but a second which isn’t long enough for my needs considering the negative display is very hard to read at times. Overall this is a decent watch but I returned it due to the small size and bad visibility
customer_reviews.author: J. Edward Baker

customer_reviews.title: Good watch just overpriced
customer_reviews.text: Overpriced but it’s comfortable to wear all day super durable hard to read and one button to easy to change it’s to sensitive
customer_reviews.author: Michael Culotta

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.text: It seems durable and waterproof, but I have not gone diving with it. The plastic band gets annoying after several hours on my wrist.
customer_reviews.author: Marty L.

customer_reviews.title: Military style and quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this watch for my son. He had a watch similar to this one which he had for 10 years. So when we got this one, he was very happy. Same brand and silimar quality. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Wilson Barreto

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift. Everything he wanted works. Has not tried the water resistant. But everything else is great.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: The best watch I have ever had for work.
customer_reviews.text: Great for manual labor work, tough, the buttons are recessed so I don't change the time while im lifting and pushing things at work.
customer_reviews.author: jeromy

customer_reviews.title: Great watch. Wanted something durable for my upcoming deployment ...
customer_reviews.text: Great watch. Wanted something durable for my upcoming deployment that has an alarm, backlight, and is waterproof. Perfect watch for that. Looks good as well. Obviously, it's a big watch more suitable for men but will work great for what I need it for.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria2112

customer_reviews.title: too hard to see
customer_reviews.text: it's a decent watch and the features are nice, but I find the digital numbers hard to read in normal light. they just blend to the background. i need to constantly push the light button to be able to see the time. i don't wear the watch often because of it.
customer_reviews.author: D. Phipps

customer_reviews.title: Bought twice over the years
customer_reviews.text: Used to have this watch in high school and then joined the military. Not sure where it ended up but over 7 years after the original purchase I still went back and bought the same watch again. Easily the best G-Shock for the money. It gets dinged all around the ship and still shows no wear or tear. Glow function is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: cody andrews

customer_reviews.title: Tough.
customer_reviews.text: I use these for work watches, doing physical labor with dirt, sweat, dings, timing projects; always come through. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: L. Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Husband is still thanking me.
customer_reviews.text: My husband literally still thanks me for his watch and I gave it to him months ago.
customer_reviews.author: Josiah Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Well built but difficult to read
customer_reviews.text: Pros- The watch is well constructed and appears to be able to take some abuse but that’s why you buy a Gshock. Cons- considering the overall size of the watch the display is too small and gold on Black lcd is tough to read in the daylight.
customer_reviews.author: Michael V. Porco

customer_reviews.title: Great watch, but Black/Black is just too dark
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality G Shock watch for a bargain price. Although the Black/Black looks sleek, the inverted face with a dark background and light digits is just too dark to consistently read the time unless under a direct overhead lighting source or using the illumination button. If you like the design, I suggest that you try one of the other colors.
customer_reviews.author: M. King

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY!!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. There are so many great reviews, but I wish I paid attention to the poor reviews. The poor reviews are spot on.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Rush

customer_reviews.title: Great style and functionality, hard to read
customer_reviews.text: I like the watch's functionality a lot and the backlight is excellent. Unfortunately with the black background it is just too dark to read in anything but difect sunlight. I will be exchanging it for a more conventional display.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is what it is.
customer_reviews.text: Typical GShock watch with all similar functions and amenities. Didn't care much for the illumination part. I guess if I was in the military this would be ideal due to the subdued illumination. It is what it is.
customer_reviews.author: leadpipefitter

customer_reviews.title: To dark background.
customer_reviews.text: This watch is very hard to read on low light. Style is nice, but what is the point if you can't read it.😞
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Screen to dark
customer_reviews.text: Screen is too dark and have to hit light button to see time
customer_reviews.author: gordy

customer_reviews.title: Tough watch
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this a few months back and have recently put it to the test. It withstands salt water, heat, & more. Very rugged! Great Buy!
customer_reviews.author: JBags72

customer_reviews.title: To dark in negative color
customer_reviews.text: A little to dark in the negative color which causes use of light function more than necessary, very durable & affordable
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Good watch
customer_reviews.text: This model is resistant and practical for daily use. The only negative observation is the low clarity of your digits.
customer_reviews.author: FLAVIA

customer_reviews.title: I don’t like it.
customer_reviews.text: The time display is too small and dimly lit to read. Purchase was a mistake. Will give watch away. Too much hassle to return.
customer_reviews.author: mike chgo

customer_reviews.title: Dark display.
customer_reviews.text: I dont know if it was delivered with a dead battery but the display is almost too dark to read. I will return and likely not buy G-shock because of it. Other than that ot feels like a decent quality watch for $50.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Screen is so dark to make this unusable
customer_reviews.text: The screen is so dark it is hard to read even in direct sunlight. Not the display you’d expect from the pictures on the Amazon site.
customer_reviews.author: B. Sifford

customer_reviews.title: No lighting
customer_reviews.text: Just pulled it out of the box and the backlight will not work and can barely see the display. For the money, I would expect all the functions of the watch to work 😔
customer_reviews.author: bruce collins

customer_reviews.title: You can barely see the time because the display is ...
customer_reviews.text: You can barely see the time because the display is dark and the time is dark. Can't find a way to adjust it. Could not wear and can't find where ti return this? Hope amazon will help with this., My son never wore it because he can't read the time. :(
customer_reviews.author: Mamabear5

customer_reviews.title: Not for rugged use
customer_reviews.text: We gave this to our son, a solider; for Christmas. The watch has lots of nice features but one of the band pins has broken twice and we've paid to have it repaired. It just hasn't held up to the training.
customer_reviews.author: TBTaylor

customer_reviews.title: 👍
customer_reviews.text: Its durable enough to swim in the lake/rivers and manages not to get easily scuffed. Great product with no issues so far!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dead battery or defective
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice just what I wanted but I think the batterie is dead can barely read time and black light dose not work well I did get it to work a few times but never 2 times back to back.baught some batteries ima change come back and write another.
customer_reviews.author: Pablo obeso

customer_reviews.title: Light
customer_reviews.text: Wish there was a way to keep the light on during night time instead of continuously pressing the button, but other than that it's a great watch if you work construction or outdoors!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler22

customer_reviews.title: Not Medic suitable (or any first responder/health professional for that matter)
customer_reviews.text: If you need it to accurately track something in a timely fashion, pass on this watch. I work as a paramedic and it was useless at tracking for pulses and respiration, and the light function was left wanting. Pony up for a better G shock model as it will be well worth your time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Indestructible
customer_reviews.text: I wear it all the time. I play with my dogs all the time and my puppy goes for the watch every time. It’s still workin and not a scratch. Very happy. I can wear it anywhere and so far it’s held up during work. Very happy with his watch.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Robert Corbin

customer_reviews.title: Very nice watch look and feel
customer_reviews.text: Been a small fan of G-shocks growing up and I started looking for watches since I haven’t had one in a while. My first impression was the smoothness and the prescient feel and look on these. You can’t go wrong with this watch.
customer_reviews.author: Luis M. Servellon

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and performs like other g shocks I have owned
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and performs like other g shocks I have owned. My only complaint is the screen is very hard to read at a glance. There isn't enough contrast so you have to spend more time looking at it to be able to register what time it is. Wish I chose another color configuration.
customer_reviews.author: Cdub

customer_reviews.title: I guess you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Can’t even read the display. Even when it’s illuminated. It’s going back.
customer_reviews.author: CW

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, I got it for my son going on ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, I got it for my son going on his first Army deployment to Afghanistan. Dark screen my old eyes would need something brighter.. just right for him.
customer_reviews.author: Steve G

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves this watch
customer_reviews.text: When my husband graduated from Air Force BMT, I wanted to get him something practical that he would be able to use throughout his career in the Air Force. He LOVES this watch. It is super light weight, easy to use, water resistant, and just so practical to have.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Fortuny

customer_reviews.title: it will do the job
customer_reviews.text: has gshock look and function.band ok. Black display looks 'cool' while not really adding to usability[as in lots of 'cool' things]. it's gtg.
customer_reviews.author: bob

customer_reviews.title: great watch for my smaller wrist
customer_reviews.text: had the other one for years and got this one just like it.
customer_reviews.author: E. Loughridge

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: My fiancé loves his watch. He takes it surfing and wears it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Reliable watch.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, very reliable watch.I use it for work and I use all the watch functions and so far is always right on time.
customer_reviews.author: TITO

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy watch.
customer_reviews.text: This watch is great. My favorite G-Shock that I have owned so far. No problems with it so far. I always get it went and bump it into things and have not had any failure.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald

customer_reviews.title: Pay attention to the background color when ordering
customer_reviews.text: I just wish I would have gotten the gray background instead of the black. I didn’t realize that I ordered that one until I got it. The numbers can be a little hard to see.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Casio G-Shock Rocks!
customer_reviews.text: Look no further. For the price paid, this Casio G-Shock watch absolutely rocks. The rugged stylish looks is a bonus. Just great.
customer_reviews.author: mmi76

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and reliable.
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch.Its durable and fashionable. I can't wait to get more G SHOCK watches in different colors. ✌♥️😀
customer_reviews.author: JJ Strong

customer_reviews.title: I bought this as a gift for my husband. ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my husband. The only complaint was it's very hard to see the numbers when you are changing the time/date, and you can't use the illumination/backlight at the same time as adjusting it. Otherwise, my husband really likes his watch.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Good water resist product
customer_reviews.text: Ive submerged this watch multiple times and still works well.
customer_reviews.author: Zane Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Working great for my son
customer_reviews.text: Working great for my son, only draw back so far is the alarm is not loud enough to wake him up! 😁
customer_reviews.author: Lorri Willits

customer_reviews.title: worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: Best watch for all around activities, after a year i still have mine
customer_reviews.author: komperdzik

customer_reviews.title: Display
customer_reviews.text: The display is a little dim but it works just fine. it fits my fat wrist just fine and it is easy to set up the time.
customer_reviews.author: Angeles Fam

customer_reviews.title: Wanted one for a while,great value
customer_reviews.text: I have wanted a G-Shock watch for a while, and this deal was too good to pass on. Great watch, looks great, just a little hard to read.
customer_reviews.author: Ernie Megginson

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last long
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch for my husband. It would have been a great watch if it had lasted longer than three months before breaking during a basketball game he was playing.
customer_reviews.author: A.S.

customer_reviews.title: ... most G-Shocks I have seen but it's still a nice watch. Just the right size I guess
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a bit smaller then most G-Shocks I have seen but it's still a nice watch. Just the right size I guess.
customer_reviews.author: MADCLOWN6000

customer_reviews.title: Everything
customer_reviews.text: Love this watch! Great watch to wear to work. Stylish. Light and durable... best $50 ever spent. The only complaint is setting a alarm or timer could be easier. Stopwatch is perfect though! 9/10
customer_reviews.author: griffin.ph

customer_reviews.title: It tells time
customer_reviews.text: Good watch for the price. Like the count down timer. I had a Wal-Mart watch before cost me 10 bucks we will see how this one holds up
customer_reviews.author: josh kjar

customer_reviews.title: Digital screen not readable
customer_reviews.text: Digital screen to dark for Black/Black model, will switch to Matte/Black
customer_reviews.author: Vladimir Stepanov

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to read in light
customer_reviews.text: Black with white lighting...:bad call, difficult to read during sunlight.
customer_reviews.author: SZ

customer_reviews.title: Well made but wish for me that the number would  be larger  for aging  eye like mine .
customer_reviews.text: Brought for my son he like ir very much , thanks
customer_reviews.author: Daniel P .

customer_reviews.title: Durable, accurate, resourceful
customer_reviews.text: Great and durable watch. Have dropped it a few times with no damages. A little hard to read under lighting conditions that are too bright for the backlight and too dark to see normally, other than that, perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Kris neal

customer_reviews.title: 3 years later
customer_reviews.text: 3 years later and this watch has survived everything I've put it through. Taken through mud, rain, on runs, hikes, through boot camp, etc. Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: meow

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great Product. Bought one for my man over a year ago and it is still of one his favorites to wear to work. Bought this one for my son and it looks awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon.Trask

customer_reviews.title: Got this for my husband for Christmas but let him ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband for Christmas but let him look at it and he found the numbers hard to read. we may have to return it and make another choice.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice watch. Has a lot of great features, its light, and it looks cool
customer_reviews.author: Rick Curry

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These watches are awesome. Tough as hell, and they work.
customer_reviews.author: Northwest

customer_reviews.title: Unable to see anything on screen at most angles.
customer_reviews.text: Please do not purchase this watch. At most angles you cannot see anything on the screen.
customer_reviews.author: N. M.

customer_reviews.title: With this model the timer should be a color that can be easily read
customer_reviews.text: Love the watch but this one is hard to see the time
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as described.
customer_reviews.text: Not as described. Dark and very hard to read. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Watch display is very dark
customer_reviews.text: The watch display is to dark. We had to return it to get a lighter face display. Same watch, but a different color!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can’t go wrong with the G
customer_reviews.text: You know what you are getting. A solid reliable watch that can take a beating. My last one broke when a ladder fell on in, but I’m convinced it saved my wrist from breaking. Looks good too.
customer_reviews.author: T. Higdon

customer_reviews.title: This watch is awesome and relatively inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: This watch is awesome and relatively inexpensive. My only complaint is that, because of the black background, it's sometimes difficult to see what time it is in lower light situations.
customer_reviews.author: hako3

customer_reviews.title: Perfect watch for a marine!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this watch for my husband! It's waterproof and pretty much life proof! He works a lot with his hands so he needed a watch that was gonna be able to hold up! It's the only watch he likes! Definitely worth getting!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Eh..I guess
customer_reviews.text: Its a bit small when it wraps around the wrist but it'll do.
customer_reviews.author: Omari

customer_reviews.title: Watch is good price for what it is
customer_reviews.text: Watch is awesome have worn it everyday and it does everything I need
customer_reviews.author: JCM

product_meta.title: Casio Men's 'G-Shock' Quartz Resin Sport Watch
product_meta.description:
With full 200M WR, Shock Resistant, 24Hr stopwatch and countdown timer, standard issue never looked this good. Black resin band digital watch with black face.




PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Product Dimensions :4.8 x 2.2 x 3.3 inches; 4.8 Ounces
 * Item model number :DW9052-1CCG
 * Department :Womens
 * Batteries :1 Lithium ion batteries required. (included)
 * Date First Available :November 6, 2008
 * Manufacturer :Casio
